pwa_prompt_message: This website has app functionality. Add it to your home screen to use it in fullscreen.
something_wrong: An error was occured. Please try again.
privacy_policy_message: I declare that I have read and agree to the GuestAccess app {{privacy_policy}}
privacy_policy_error: You must read and agree to our Privacy Policy to proceed with registration.
password_rules: Password must have: 8 characters, 1 letter and 1 number
string_firstName: First Name is an invalid string
invalid_is_between_birthDate: The user must be younger than 100 years old AND must be older than 16 years old.
email_validation_body: Check your email for instructions on how to validate your account and start using the app.
recover_email_body: Recover password email was successfully sent!
rate_place: How would you rate this place?
rate_error: Please write a comment (Min 6 characters) and answer the questions
name: Name
create_error: Write a name for the place with at least 3 characters.
radius_error: Unable to define route for same origin and destination location
problem_request_delete_place: There was a problem requesting to delete place.
marked_as_closed: You already marked this place as closed.
place_conflict: Place already exists, please go back to the map.
are_you_sure: A request is going to be sent! Are you sure?
confirm_delete: Are you sure you wish to delete this item?
is_it_unaccessible: Is this place accessible to people with:
lorem-ipsum: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consetetur sit sadipscing elitr, sed diam nonumy eirmod ut tempor invidunt ut labore et dolore magna aliquyam erat, sed diam voluptua.
tutorial_1: Begin your journey to a more inclusive world. Rate places for their accessibility and contribute to a universal accessible environment.
tutorial_2: Sign up to actively participate in rating locations accessibility .
tutorial_3: Click on the map icons to rate places, add new ones or add obstacles on the street (Click on the icon +)
tutorial_4: Use the search feature to find specific places from a distance.
tutorial_5: Fill in the accessibility questionnaires based on your experience.
tutorial_6: Plan directions, choosing accessible routes, avoiding obstacles.
tutorial_7_1: More reviews mean more useful information for others to find accessible spaces.
tutorial_7_2: Enjoy using Map4Accessibility and help create a more accessible world. Your input matters!
denied_geo: We were unable to get your current position. Please check your device or browser location settings
ue_content_text: This project is funded by the Erasmus+ programme of the European Union under grant agreement No 2021-1-IT02-KA220-HED-00003032. However, the views and opinions expressed are solely those of the author(s) and do not necessarily reflect those of the European Union or the Education and Culture Executive Agency (EACEA). Neither the European Union nor the EACEA can be held responsible for them.
thanks_for_feedback: Thank you for your feedback. We're always seeking to improve places and cities accessibility with our app. Can you give us some feedback about the app?
